title: Canyonlands National Park: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps      Â    Maps These publications are freely distributed by the National Park Service. All require Adobe Acrobat Reader for viewing. Canyonlands Trip Planning Map [517k PDF file] Full park map shows backcountry campsites, zones and mileages.  Island in the Sky Map [317k PDF file] Shows Island in the Sky district campsites, roads and trails with brief overview text (black and white).  The Maze Map [231k PDF file] Shows Maze district campsites, roads and trails, with brief overview text (black and white).  The Needles Map [274k PDF file] Shows Needles District campsites, roads and trails with brief overview text (black and white).  Park Map [435k PDF file] Full color map that is handed out at entrance stations. This map does not include backpacking sites or road/trail mileages. Horseshoe Canyon Map [786k PDF file] Information about the history of Horseshoe Canyon. Includes map of vehicle access roads.  To download language translations of the park map, or for brochures on additional topics, visit the Publications page.
